name: Redis
description: In-memory data structure store. Fast caching, session storage, and message broker.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    container_name: redis
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: redis-server --appendonly yes {{REDIS_PASSWORD}}
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:6379"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=redis"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=database"

notes: Use Redis Commander for GUI management
